image_contents: Split layout. Left half: photograph of two fishing boats on the water with seagulls in the sky. Right half: light blue panel with 'Celebrating 24 Years' in black heading text, followed by a paragraph of black text, and an orange button labeled 'Read Now' at the bottom.
overlay_text: Celebrating 24 Years Since 2001, Vital Choice has been delivering premium wild seafood to tables across the country, long before we joined the 1-800-Flowers.com Read Now
suggested_alt_text: Fishing boats on water next to text celebrating Vital Choice's 24 years.
